verbs.description: [ARG1: A summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin] [V: is] [ARG2: “ extremely important ” to safeguard global stability] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a top Russian diplomat] .
A summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin is “ extremely important ” to [V: safeguard] [ARG1: global stability] , according to a top Russian diplomat .
A summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin is “ extremely important ” to safeguard global stability , [V: according] to a top Russian diplomat .
